summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of North and West 41st Street, from Palatine Avenue to 2nd Avenue Northwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by sewers, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6986, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
